title: Francoise Hardy
brief_description: Biopic portrait of the solitary French pop chanteuse. A clip for ‘Peau de chagrin” offers an elliptical tour of chez Hardy. A further melancholy filmclip provides vicarious intercutting of candid Paris street scenes - notable for gratuitous footage of French youngsters gamely drawing back on Celtique cigarettes.
